name: get_items_by_query
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool rpg_items.
Tool description: An api of generated RPG items
API description: Fetch RPG item details based on provided query parameters such as rank, slot, rarity, name, and type from the RPG Items API.

rank.description: The rank of the item (default is '1').

slot.description: The inventory slot type of the item (default is 'chest').

rarity.description: The rarity of the item (default is 'common').

name.description: The name of the item (default is 'Linen Cloth Robe').

type.description: The type of the item (default is 'armor').
